problem.p: In the image above, block 1 is stacked on top of block 2. The blocks are at rest on a flat plane, with gravity present.

We want to choose a system that will allow us to find the normal force (or contact force) between blocks 1 and 2. Assuming we know the masses of the objects and the contact force between the table and block 2, what system will let us do this?

choice.text: Either a system with block 1 or a system with block 2.
Only a system with both blocks.
No choice of system will let us find this.
